name: Business Talk
text: Pizza was nice and hot. Worth paying the $2 for extra cheese. Time of delivery was great. Im very pleased. Good job!

name: Kevin M
text: Best spot to have something when in a rush. The service is efficient, rates are affordable, great vibes. Will visit here again

name: Chad Stol
text: Went for the weekly lunch buffet.  Quick service, got seated immediately,  along with drinks. Friendly, helpful waitress.  Somewhat small  selection of pizza flavors for the buffet.

name: Taylor Dobmeier
text: My go-to delivery in Lafayette. Fairly priced, late delivery hours, and friendly delivery people. Consistent good pizza.

name: Violet Wright
text: I ordered a large pizza (handtossed) and it was thin crust and the bread was over done and the bites were not tasty. The side marinara sauce was so watery - tomato soup is more thicker and tasty. The person was nice but it wasnt worth $20.00 a waste.

name: Patrick Carpenter
text: Super good pizza and the people/employees are always so nice and in a good mood.

name: Cobra Lily
text: I take my son every Sunday for lunch. Pizza is always fresh, crust is perfectly crispy and workers are kind and courteous.

name: Sarah Cooper
text: Great staff. Friendly and clean environment. Good food everytime and quick deliveries

name: Amey Dani
text: Extremely unfriendly and rude staff. Don't know why they have a dine in area if they refuse to serve dine in. We waited for 10 minutes and not a single person came to greet us. After that the one person who was working there refused to help us. Never ever going to a pizza hut after this awful experience.

name: Jo Newsad
text: We were a little nervous to eat here because of all of the bad reviews, but we had no problems whatsoever. The place was empty so we had great service. Ordered the thin and crispy Supreme pizza and cheese knots -- both were very good. The …More

text: after previous bad experiences a year + ago i gave them another go. my order was correct, hot, on point and the driver was both on time and polite. pizza hut is pricy but i know that’s not on the store. they’re definitely worth a shot despite other poor reviews and being given the benefit of the doubt. glad i did.

text: Ordered pizza hut for the first time in a long time now I remember why I stopped ordering pizza hut! It's been 1 hour and 15 mins and it literally just showed up! Pizza Hut is pretty bad as a rule, this is maybe the worst one.
